name: Mush Rooms
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Left Click to consume  mushrooms
Space to Jump

Tools used:
Godot Game Engine

Nomad Sculpt & Blender for the 3D Models

Ableton & Electric Guitar For the music

Sound effects from freesounds.org

Link to (messy gamejam code) https://github.com/richardbonneau/mcgamejam-2022
